    public static class MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver.FieldAccessing
extends Object
implements MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver
    A resolver that replaces an interaction with a byte code element with a field access.

        参数:

    • 方法详细资料

      • isResolved

        public boolean isResolved()
        从接口复制的说明: MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver
        Checks if this resolver was actually resolved, i.e. if a member should be substituted at all.
        指定者:
        isResolved 在接口中 MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver
        返回:
        true if a found member should be substituted.

      • apply

        public StackManipulation apply(TypeDescription instrumentedType,
                               ByteCodeElement target,
                               TypeList.Generic arguments,
                               TypeDescription.Generic result)
        从接口复制的说明: MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver
        Applies this resolver. This is only legal for resolved resolvers.
        指定者:
        apply 在接口中 MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver
        参数:
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type.
        target - The substituted byte code element.
        arguments - The factual arguments to the byte code element.
        result - The expected result type or void if no result is expected.
        返回:
        A stack manipulation that applies the resolved byte code representing the substitution.
